Feb 7 (Reuters) - Citigroup Global Markets:

  • CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKET AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - OFFERING OF SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA

  • CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS - FUNDS MANAGED BY WARBURG PINCUS, MORNINGSTAR INVESTMENT ANNOUNCE INTENTION TO SELL ABOUT 53 MILLION SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA

  • CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS LIMITED - PLACING SHARES ARE BEING OFFERED TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS BY WAY OF AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
